website_summaries.verdict: A great, durable unit that looks great. Bags are a bit small for adults, though.
pros: Two, bags make for easy sorting
Hand-woven basket is durable and will hold up well in even humid environments
cons: Bags fill up in a hurry -- ideal for kids' clothes, but adults will have to empty hamper often

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this hamper like absolutely love but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this hamper like absolutely love but for some reason on two occasions I have had defective items come in. First time the flaps didn’t align properly and so it wouldn’t open and close correctly. The replacement for that came a week later with one of the flaps completely dented it I didn’t even take it out of the box. I just want a good looking piece. Hopefully third time is a charm if not unfortunately I will be looking elsewhere. Beautiful item poor construction and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great hamper
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this hamper! Very good value, although only time will tell how sturdy it is. Each side fits about a full washer load (standard household size).
customer_reviews.author: dedicated1776

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to fill the empty spaces of my under-the-TV-shelves where I keep all my knitting parafenelia and it works perfectly. They were the only baskets I could find whose measurements fit the available space, they assemble in a snap and have a very neutral look. They are light weight and probably not designed to hold anything very heavy, nor should they be used for carrying, as the bottom rests on simple short wire hoocks. Ordered 4 of them first and then decided to add two more. Can recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They fit perfectly under my coffee table ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit perfectly under my coffee table for extra storage, are well made and an awesome color(they are a little bit lighter than they appear in this photo I took). I also bought a second set to use as storage in my small hallway closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: double-duty as scratching post...
customer_reviews.text: this is a perfectly decent laundry hamper. I live in southern Alabama and haven't had any problems with moisture/molding. Each side holds one large load of laundry. Cat owners beware: my cat LOVES this as a scratching post, so I sweep away little pieces every day. It's taken a lot of abuse from him (yes, he has another real scratching post that he also loves), and it is still structurally sound but it looks pretty ratty. Now I'm looking for a hamper less attractive to the cat.
customer_reviews.author: philosophotarian

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME baskets for AWESOME price!
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are such a good deal so very sturdy! I am so glad I waited to buy some and then I found these! They fold and have a hard bottom you insert when open. I bought them for my bed my fiancé and I just made and they are perfect. The bed is a copycat from Pottery barn and we love it! This is the three pieces of the bed stacked on top for now because we aren't quite done. But they look so well with it!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love these Baskets!  They are so versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these baskets. They come flat...you just open them up and the inside pops into the bottom. They actually seem pretty sturdy. I initially ordered two sets. Now I have re-ordered two additional sets. I used two of the baskets in my closet to hold my scarves. Now I need additional ones to hold my hats. I also plan on putting two in my pantry. They even fit on the inside my television stand. They are so versatile. Am I a basket case? I think so....At least for these baskets. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: RocksNoSalt

customer_reviews.title: Colors were different. Not as sturdy as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: These baskets LOOK nice. Beyond that, I’m not so sure. The quality is definitely sub par. I ordered 2 sets, and one of the baskets has a bottom that has about s 1” gap all around, and I don’t think it’ll hold anything without the bottom collapsing. I’m also bummed because the colors of the baskets are different. I got one light colored basket, like the one in the purchase picture, and 3 darker colored baskets. I wish they were all the same color. Overall, they ok good, but it definitely looks like I couldn’t find a matching basket and just threw them together for my console table.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Makes our closet look very neat and tidy and saved the need for more drawers
customer_reviews.text: These boxes were perfect for our walk-in closet and provided the added storage we needed to avoid buying a dresser after moving into our new home. I used these for neck scarves and shawls and beachwear and they're also perfect for my husband's jeans. For lingerie or anything delicate I would recommend lining the bottom and sides with tissue just in case anything might snag, but the basket weave is pretty smooth. I liked them so much I'm buying 2 more sets to finish putting everything neatly away from sight.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Wet and moldy.
customer_reviews.text: The baskets were wet and moldy. Had to spray them down with a mild bleach solution and run a brush over them. Waiting to see if they're salvageable. They were salvageable. Either the material wasn't properly cured or it was made wet. The package and second basket were dry, but one basket was soggy and covered in fuzzy grey mold. Sprayed it down with a bleach solution and a grey dust cloud erupted. Brushed the mold off and put it in the oven at 230 degrees F. It came out OK. I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning them, but I wouldn't order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Arrives FLAT!
customer_reviews.text: Sides will move around when handle, needs a bottom piece for staying fixed! Over priced because of the simplicity of the item. CORRECTION!, I found a hinged piece on the bottom and it folds down to form a bottom, it works great now!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Burney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good hamper. Plenty of room for laundry and decent look. It has been mentioned but it is worth repeating - there is no bottom. Not a big deal, just a little strange. I have two of these - this one and the double oval shaped one.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, useful, and not packaged in plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at quite a few laundry hampers and am glad to have picked this one (the oval double hamper option)! I love that it has two separate areas and that they are in their own independent bags. I can remove one bag and leave the other inside the hamper. It came put together, so no hassle there. Also, MAJOR KUDOS to the company for shipping this hamper completely free of plastic. That was why I purchased a natural fiber hamper and so I was really happy to see how it arrived. I'll update this review if my opinion changes over time and use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an attractive but functional hamper. Our room is small and everything I add to it is very visible. It holds a surprising amount. But after 9 months we decided to get another one. His and hers. Personal preference of how we sort and wash clothes. It's also very sturdy. We have 6 kids and 3 crazy little little boys. They use this thing as a step stool to get stuff off the dresser. And it's still in perfect condition. If it can survive my boys that's saying something!! And it's also surprisingly easy to carry. Liner easily removed to wash. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: AngelEmm

customer_reviews.title: Better than in picture!
customer_reviews.text: This very attractive hamper required no assembly! IT is small, which is perfect for me as I have limited space. Also as a single person, the "smallness" of the laundry bags is perfect. It's like a regular size hamper, split in half! Which I realize won't work for everyone, but in a small house or apt for a single person, IT IS PERFECT. I like it so much, I ordered another one, cause once received, I could tell it would fit in my bathroom, bedroom or laundry area - and it is way cute.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Color is great, sturdy construction. Each side is just the right size for my weekly wash (live by myself), and being able to pre-sort my scrubs into their own side really helps on laundry day.
customer_reviews.author: jpogostick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this when I saw it online. And still in love with it when it arrived. It folded out and within seconds, I had my hamper. I wouldn’t expect it to hold up with carrying it a lot from room to room. I wouldn’t put heat things on top. It wouldn’t use it in a kids room nor around large dogs. It’s very Pretty though and I do enjoy the look.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely the prettiest hamper I've owned but I'm disappointed on the quality of the fabric bags. One of them ripped during the first use. Now I'm left with a single fabric bag that won't stay up because it relies on the other one for support. I'd say the quality could be better for the price, otherwise it's a fine hamper. Just get a sewing machine at the ready.
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: I’d keep it if it was half the price....
customer_reviews.text: I love the material of this hamper. It is very pretty, but for the price I didn’t realize it was a “pop-up” design. The corners are not rigid and so when you lift the lid or pick up the hamper it doesn’t stay in its rectangular shape. Very wobbly so I am going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Erin DeHerrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to store tools that I use on a regular basis. I paired them with some clear acrylic trays by Whitmore to keep things organized and tidy. They look really attractive and are much more pleasant to pull off a shelf than an industrial looking toolbox. I've put a lot of weight in these and moved them from room to room for various projects, and they've held up well! The handles and bottoms feel sturdy. Plus, the weaving hasn't come loose like some other natural baskets I've owned over the years.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer of stuff

customer_reviews.title: Generous Size, No Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my large, old wicker hamper because it started unraveling and when I carried it, it scratched my legs. This hamper is great! Sturdy, delivered assembled, 2 separate flip up doors for the 2 separate sides. Each side has its own removable canvas laundry bag. Each bag stays secured by Velcro and canvas ties. They are easy to remove and take out to carry the laundry. I couldn’t be happier with my new hamper. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: ADORE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love wicker and this laundry basket! Great quality and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sarag

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I also bought the white 3 bag Seville hamper. One for me and one for my wife. The 3 bag came in a flat box with parts all banged up and nasty. This came completely assembled in a box. It doesn't look high quality, but it does look like the pictures. I am so relieved that it is not one of those flimsy hampers held up by thin rods and aluminum at the opening. Those are terrible. If this one has any issues, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Baskets - Kid-Tested!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little baskets! I ordered these to fit on the shelves on our TV stand to hold my 9 month old's toys, and they are perfect. Super easy "assembly" takes about 3 seconds. The two baskets hold ALL of her toys. We have had them for a month and they have held up amazingly to her throwing, standing on/in and generally abusing them. I only wish there was a way to secure the bottom so they can't fold, but that's a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: allthatglittersisgold

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good-sized hamper
customer_reviews.text: Our washer/dryer is in the basement, and towels, t-shirts and socks seemed to pile up just outside the basement door. I was more than tired of arguing about that, so I ordered this hamper for that spot, which also happens to be in a heavily trafficked area at the perimeter of the kitchen. This hamper has been tough enough and dark-toned enough to withstand the abuse and not be too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Marc S.

customer_reviews.title: Unknown brown Bugs everywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: Bugs!!!! Everywhere!!! Found 4 bugs attached to the hamper!!!! Found couple of moldy spots too!!!!! Waited for 2weeks to get this product. so disappointed and disgusting😷😓
customer_reviews.author: Jae Jeon

customer_reviews.title: Finishing touch!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and was a great price. I can compare it to the $100 wicker hampers. This also folds flat so it’s great for a dorm and easy to move. Looks so nice in my laundry room! I’m in love with a hamper! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McAllister

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful addition to the home
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous in person! I love the water hyacinth. They are SO STURDY and they hold so much stuff. It’s bananas! This is the best laundry hamper I have ever owned and I feel so grown up having something that isn’t plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: and quite sturdy. The hamper arrived all in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Storage Brothers rolling laundry hamper that was beginning to succumb to the pressure of family apartment living. The water hyacinth weave is mostly even, attractive, and quite sturdy. The hamper arrived all in one piece, so there was no assembly. The bags are real canvas and are thick and seem well sewn. It's a very cute hamper, holds about a load of laundry per bag, and it keeps the hallway clean and tidy looking. Also contains the smell of stinky sweaty workout clothes pretty well. Definitely an upgrade from our previous hamper.
customer_reviews.author: VioletandRyeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A Case for a Basket
customer_reviews.text: These are great baskets. They are thick and look much more expensive than they are. I may order more in the future. The only drawback might be if you want to store small items in the basket, think Lego bricks. Since they fold flat there is a slight gap, maybe 1/4" around the bottom. I am storing towels in my guest bath so this is not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Great Company
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is everything it's claimed to be. It is beautiful & sturdy. I recognize that I only eye-balled the hamper and did not actually measure, so unfortunately, I cannot use it. I was initially quite upset over $30 return pick up fee, that's 1/2 the hamper. I am not able to return it myself. I regret not being able to use this hamper, but I also wish to let you know that they FULLY refunded me!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Well priced, attractive baskets
customer_reviews.text: The tv stand is a heavy, solid oak kitchen cabinet we removed from over the breakfast bar. Fortuitously, it is exactly the width of the tv. Equally fortuitously, these baskets fit exactly in the cabinet spaces. The baskets arrive flat and are very easy to unfold into a rectangular shape. They are attractive and sturdy and it seems to me that you can’t possibly beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Hamper's mocha coloring not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, and seemed to be a good quality hamper. Nicely packaged and arrived on time. However, we ultimately returned this hamper due to the weird variation of colors in the wicker used. We were expecting a dark brown, "mocha" color, and received a hamper with very light wicker mixed in with the darker brown. QC issue? Almost half of the lid was this lighter color with the way it was woven. Unfortunately, this was not what we expected based on the pictures of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Both of the laundry bags ripped after one wash. There were giant holes at the bottom seam. When I contacted the company to replace the bags, I noticed they have an entire department dedicated to replacing items in parts. This tells me that their products are very low quality. I will never buy anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, terrible liners
customer_reviews.text: Basket is great looking, and super cute with the rest of my decor. Liners however, are terrible. Mine opened up at the seams less than a month into use and u don’t stuff them with laundry. They’re actually pretty small so stuffing them isn’t even possible. Contacted manufacturer to buy replacement liners, they said they don’t sell them, but can only replace them with picture proof. I already threw the defective liners out so they wouldn’t allow for a replacement under the 1-yr warranty. And now this is out of the amazon return window. Pretty useless product without the liners, too bad because this is the only hamper I’ve found that I liked.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Well built, sturdy, and nice to look at. It comes with two bags that separate the hamper - I suppose for separating the clothes (colored and white clothes). I removed the bags which allows for more clothes. It isn't as big as I would like but larger than a lot of others I looked at. I'm very pleased with this hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Fox

customer_reviews.title: awesome baskets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome baskets!! Big and strong!! For the price you can't go wrong!!! (Hey that rhymed!!) Sure they smell but it goes away after a day or 2. And if you put your nose right up to it after that day, you may still smell the materials. No big deal. Who is going to sit and smell baskets? Honestly, people complaining about the smell are just too darn sensitive. And I have a SUPER smeller. So smells often bother me. These, not really. It's made of organic materials. So yeah, they have a smell. Nothing bad. I've bought several of these and will buy more!!! Many more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hamper
customer_reviews.text: This laundry hamper is exactly what I was looking for. It looks nice enough to have out visibly. I love that it has two sections. It's a bit annoying to undo the ties to take the bags out, so I bring in a plastic basket from the laundry room to transfer loads. Not a big deal, it's worth it to not have an eyesore in the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: You know you're getting old when you're excited about a hamper. It's seriously beautiful and so well made. The covers don't slam down when you let them go which I think is a small but convenient detail. The material isn't actual wicker but more like a plastic but I think this is better considering you wouldn't want it snagging onto your clothes. I'm glad I splurged on this one instead of buying another $5 hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Great little hamper
customer_reviews.text: Really like these hampers. We have 2 side by side and use them to separate our laundry. They are not very big. One is about right for 2 people. You will definitely have to do laundry weekly. But they look good and you can remove the bags if you want to. So far still looking new after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 debt makers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: I read some harsh reviews of this product but the one I received is quite lovely. The lid fit nicely and the liner bags were easy to take on and off. I even washed them in cold water and put them through the dryer and didn’t notice any shrinkage. I love that there are two compartments to separate whites from clothes that bleed color, and the basket weave appears to be durable. I’ve only had the product for a couple weeks but so far, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after airing out
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. They are packaged flat. All you do is open them and the bottom falls into place. Perfect knock-off to more expensive baskets. The downside... The smell is horrendous. Leave them outside, put a floor fan on them, spray them with something... The smell should dissipate in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Ntownnikki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Baskets
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are beautiful, very well-made, and sturdy! They were the best deal I could find online. They fit my baby's diapers and wipes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it but packaging was horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this hamper!!!!! So cute. It did arrive dented and the box was also broken. There was no support between the actual hamper and box beside a clear bag.. It was also a used purchase. So I’m not sure if this was already there or the box and the hamper got dented while being shipped. Either way very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hamper!! Was pretty worried about it coming damaged as I read some reviews to that effect but I lucked out and it came in perfect condition, even after I saw the delivery guy throw it on my porch. It's very pretty and looks great in my bedroom. Love being able to separate my regulars and delicates.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I first want to say that I love this hamper! Exactly what I was looking for - two compartments, lightweight, washable liners, and visually attractive! The packaging was terrible and the hamper arrived dented and bent in multiple places. I was able to bend the wire structure of the hamper back into shape, but it doesn't look quite right - a little wonky on the bottom. I'm fine with this and will keep the hamper, but just beware that you may have to reshape as I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Tobie

customer_reviews.title: Nice hamper, cheap bags
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is stylish, but that's a matter of taste. What isn't subjective is that the canvas bags are cheap, lower capacity than they look, and fragile. The bags hold themselves in place with three small strips of Velcro that are loosely sewn to the bag itself. Two of the three tore off within a week of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good from across the room
customer_reviews.text: Esthetically pleasing for the most part, until you get up close. The tops are very misaligned and there are sharp pieces sticking out. Having small kids thats a hazard. Wanted to return but my husband had already tossed the box and it would have been a pain to get it shipped, so we have dealt with it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product feels sturdy (not sure for how long though, time will tell). It surely has a bottom (someone in reviews said it doesnt), looks amazing and I am personally happy with it. Some spots were not glued very well, the material started pealing off, but with a bit of glue you can save it. Overall worth for the money, I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! People stated there was no bottom but if you move the liner there is a bottom you pull shut and it works perfectly. it just comes flat in the package so you have to open it up but it is very easy to do so if you look at it. It smelled funky at first like chemicals but the smell faded fairly quickly within a day or two so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jerianna

customer_reviews.title: Love my hamper!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this hamper for so long! I'm so happy that i was able to get it finally! I agree with others about the lining falling inside, especially when its full. But its not the end of the world. I havent washed it yet so im not sure about it shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for couples!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I were looking for a hamper that was large enough for both of our clothes, but also separated so we didn't have to sort through each other's items for washing. I LOVE that both sides of the hamper have their own separate lid (so we don't have to smell each other's dirty clothes), which is very uncommon with double laundry hampers. It fits perfectly in our small bathroom. It's the most expensive hamper I've ever bought but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2d Laundry Basket
customer_reviews.text: Used upstairs to reduce going up and downstairs to take laundry to utility room. Color is great, materials appear to be top quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is great for keeping my husband's and my laundry separated! I wish it were a little bigger, but just read the measurements to make sure it will work for you. It is so much nicer to look at than the cheap plastic hampers we had before!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper. It is so convenient keeping my work pants separate from my work shirts. So easy to grab a pre-sorted load and toss into the washer. Nice size too. It can hold two weeks of work clothes before it's full! Awesome. I highly recommend! It is great looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a longtime for baskets that would fit my TV stand. I was reluctant to order these, I thought since they were collapsible, that meant they would be flimsy. That they are not. They are actually quite sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks NOTHING like the image
customer_reviews.text: Our basket came to us looking absolutely nothing like the photo. It looks terrible. It's striped like a zebra!! Definitely just head into the store to purchase something like this. I won't ever grab anything like this from amazon again, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shameika Ejiasi

customer_reviews.title: It's very beautiful! I love the design but don't like putting ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful! I love the design but don't like putting my clean clothes back in. I like to fold immediately so I need to find a different solution to bring the clothes back up from the basement, so I guess I'll need another small plastic basket. The stairway to the basement is very tight so I got this so I could bring the bags down only instead of the large basket. It seems great quality to me. I didn't notice anything weird upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy and so useful
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn't do it justice but I was too lazy to take a better one. I was worried it'd be too small compared to others I've seen online but it actually holds (each side) a good size loud perfectly. And what made me choose this instead of others is that the bags are easily separable and can take one out at a time to take with you and then put back in with velcro Looks beautiful too, so glad I went with the lighter color, really makes the room look great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance on the color...
customer_reviews.text: One had a very prominent redish hue while the other was the color expected. Others complained about the colors not matching perfectly and I was okay with it as long as they were half way close... but the discolored one almost looks stained. I think they are of decent quality, but worthless to me with such a stark color difference.
customer_reviews.author: amazonkshop

customer_reviews.title: Came with mold 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and its full of some kind of mold.
customer_reviews.author: Fer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves in the hamper?
customer_reviews.text: Product seems good so far. When it came, it had leaves in the bottom of the basket. It was very apparent that someone had returned this and it was resold to us. The product itself seems sturdy and fine, just odd to find leaves in the bottom of your NEW hamper.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice integration, quality of liner hmmm
customer_reviews.text: This is my main hamper. The two sides make it easy to separate whites from colors. The liners are nice, but the quality of the tie strings is poor. At the end of the day I did not use them or need them. Overall functional and does not stand out in my decor
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Organizational Baskets
customer_reviews.text: These are great baskets for organizing, decorating, etc. They arrive flat in the box, but easily open to their proper shape. Well made - you won't be disappointed. If you're looking for a specific dimension then be sure to read the details on these before you buy. I wanted them for a specific area in my house, but they are too small for the space. However, the price was so great and they go with any decor I didn't want to return them. I waited for the price to drop and then snatched them up.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We were flooded by Harvey, and after our house was finished, I made a point to get spaces organized well but in a pretty manner as well. I've used these baskets all over and love them. They're not super heavy duty, so I probably wouldn't use them for canned or bottled foods in a pantry, but they hold toiletries and lighter items and look very pretty. They're way less expensive than many other baskets, and they're a great size. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: SAHACUBO

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use for closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these baskets because it stated they fit in the Seville expandable closet organizer. They do not. They are about an inch too big therefore only fit in if you arrange them in a diamond shape which looks horrible and is not practical. I have no packaging to return these but I wanted to warn you that you should not buy them for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and useful storage bins,
customer_reviews.text: These were better than I imagined they would be, easy to assemble & attractive. The only thing I would tell you is "not to put anything in them that might pick easily" like delicate items" otherwise a great buy. I even came back and bought a second set :)
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and he removable canvas bags make this a utilitarian hamper.
customer_reviews.text: Got this hamper to match the grey marble floor tiling in my bathroom. It looks great and its removable canvas bags make laundry day a breeze. This hamper probably wouldn't work for a large family but it's perfect for a single person.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be lined with plastic bags or stuff inside gets caught on the fibers.
customer_reviews.text: I lined them with plastic bags and they are great for hiding my messes.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Way more tan parts than brown
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size hamper and seems sturdy. I was just disappointed with the color. It is not dark brown. It has some dark brown stripes here and there, but it mostly made up of light tan parts. It kind of looks striped, light tan stripes and brown mixed in.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Q.

customer_reviews.title: Lidded hamper with woven water hyacinth
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected, ships flat, folds out, has a liner, seems sturdy- definitely wouldn’t overload it, handles on side seem durable, priced right, shipped fast, more than happy with my new hamper!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry hamper!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this hamper! It’s very stylish and goes perfect with my room decor. I love that it has two separate compartments which I use one for my dirty laundry and the other to put the clean laundry in before I fold it. I have not yet tried to wash the linen bags therefore do not know whether they’d shrink in the dryer. However, once I do wash the linen bags I’d just hang dry vs putting them in the washer for the fear of accidentally shrinking them. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Khrystyna Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO.. I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I would have to assemble this, but nope... it arrived exactly how you see it in the picture. Perfect. There is absolutely Nothing that I would change about it. It is both simple and elegant at the same time. Very sturdy and lightweight too. Just beautiful. I searched long and hard before I found this laundry hamper. I am beyond satisfied. If you like what you see in the picture, get it. This dual sided hamper will Not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Toure

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this hamper!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the two different compartments and how it's not only sturdy, it's clean and simple. The design is great and I will be buying more for throughout the house! It was worth the extra investment for a hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Using it to sort my boys laundry. Works great, kids flip open easy and good for kids loads. Looks wonderful in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Pk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look and very durable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I am using them in my home office to de-clutter. They fit on my shelf and everything is concealed. The material isn't ideal because with heavy use it will break-down. But I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Barraco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Came covered in dark spots (mold?) and the bottom didn't line up. Also it came all frayed -- I cut off little pieces that were hanging off awkwardly. It was too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, looks great in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We previously had some canvas bins from Costco for our laundry, but they were not pretty and did not keep their shape great after washing . I wanted something I could keep out outside my closet that I could put my husband and I's everyday laundry in. This fit the bill. It looks great, and holds a weeks of worth of clothing laundry without overflowing. Bonus points because my two cats can't damage it easily. Will be purchasing another for my bathroom for linens. Definitely no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hamper
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how excited you can get over a hamper, but if you're like me and you do get excited over a hamper then you'll love this one. Lol. It's really pretty, seems sturdy and well made, comes fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3Crazies

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic
customer_reviews.text: Note that this is synthetic. The description says this, but I missed it. This is not wicker.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Usefullness of this laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive laundry hamper that comes completely assembled including the 2 bags used for separating your laundry. It is of sturdy construction but light enough to easily move it around. Its size makes it fit into most laundry rooms.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t keep in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but do not keep this in your bathroom or anywhere with excess moisture. We had this for a few months and noticed it started to actually get moldy on the bottom. I was able to get rid of it with bleach spray. After washing the inside liner, one of them started to unravel after we took it out of the dryer. Definitely not the best quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Decided to spend a little extra for a hamper that looked a bit more sturdy than some of the others I was considering since I was replacing my hamper than broke. This one is a very good size, each side holds a large load of clothes. And best of all, when you pull the clothes out, the liner doesn't come out! It is a removable liner, but it's nice to not fight with it every time I wash a load of laundry! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry basket. I'm not a fan of the price but honesty I would probably pay it again. It is the best laundry basket I have ever seen. It's large and quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: the item was perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I order two sets of two. I was looking for something to use primarily in the open space under my coffee table top. Works very well for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: They do not seem very sturdy. Honestly feel a bit brittle. Some pieces are already broken off out of box. Would not reccomend these. Mine will be in a closet so I'm not going to bother with a return but if you're using them out in plain sight, I'd be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made product. It looks great, so you can collect your laundry without having it to hide in a closet. It's also very easy to carry, so you don't need a separate laundry basket to transport your laundry to your washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Austin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE DEVIDED SIDES FOR DARKS AND WHITES, SORTING LAUNDRY A BREEZE, BUT AS FOR STURDINESS? WELL IT OK BUT I SURE WOULD NOT PUT ANYTHING TO HEAVY ONE THE TOP OF IT, NOT EVEN A SMALL CHILD.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but has a persistent grassy smell
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this hamper for a few months and have kept it both in my bedroom and closet. Wherever I put it, it continues to give off a slightly unpleasant smell. It isn't harsh or chemically, but it's surprisingly strong and very distinct, such that it's hard to ignore. It smells a bit like raisins, but less good. If I had known this, I probably would have opted for one with less of a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the look of this hamper. I had it for almost a year before I finally washed one of the bags. Like the other reviews mentioned the bag shrunk immensely. It no longer fits in the basket. And even worse the bag somehow tore in the wash ?? A huge tear that I had to sew up, AND one of the Velcro straps completely fell off. You will need to replace the bags if you get this hamper.. as they are not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Delivered in excellent condition. Doubled sided and each side holds a good size load. Very good looking- nice touch compared to standard plastic clothes baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Finley

customer_reviews.title: My son
customer_reviews.text: This laundry hamper is great, it looks great in my son's bathroom room. Except it must be hard to use or maybe it is hard to open because he doesn't seem to get his dirty clothes in there! LOL Not hampers fault!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bastin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully woven wicker hamper.
customer_reviews.text: The hamper is exactly as pictured and arrived fully assembled right out of the box. It's a beautifully woven sturdy, double-sided hamper with zero stressed or broken strands.
customer_reviews.author: SeeMissDee

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than it looks like it does
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think it was going to be big enough for mine and my fiancé’s dirty clothes, but it actually hold more than it looks. Love the color and the style, exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Weigelt

customer_reviews.title: Liner falls in basket.
customer_reviews.text: The only down fall of this product would be that the liner does not stay in place. Every time I have to put cloths in it I need to pull the liner up. Other than that the basket itself is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown on picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in my room, cant rate durability as i just purchased. I gave for stars because the white bags dont connect together on each side.. but its only for aesthetic reasons. Over all happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I like it, bought 6
customer_reviews.text: Great basket, perfect for laundry room linen shelf, hangers & stuff (ordered extra since my cat claimed one for herself, keeps her off sofa) ordered more for storage to hide plastic partyware on top of china cabinet, stay folded & out of sight when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Michele R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy baskets that withstand daily use to hold shoes in mudroom.
customer_reviews.text: It was really hard to find the right baskets for our shoes to fit in the mudroom. These baskets are pretty strong and withstand daily use and shoes being thrown in them by 3 kids... None of the baskets have started unraveling. The bottom flips up, so they can be stored if they were not in use. Nice neutral color makes for any easy match to most home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: baskets for stuff
customer_reviews.text: want a wicker basket to put stuff in? well this does the trick. collapses easily for storage when you don't need it. Who am I kidding, I always have a need to stuff things in my baskets. Great buy I must say.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the bottom of my tv stand. They look nice and do the job I intended them for. They’re not meant to hold a bunch of weight, but work for storing/hiding items.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah K.

product_meta.title: Seville Classics Water-Hyacinth Lidded Oval Double Laundry Hamper, Hand-Woven
product_meta.description: Size:Oval| Color:Water HyacinthEasily sort your laundry with the Seville Classics Water Hyacinth Lidded Oval Double Hamper. Woven from 100% natural water hyacinth into beautiful, mottled tan wicker. Hamper features steel wire construction for strength beneath the weave. Includes two heavy-duty canvas laundry bags in natural white. Each bag has dual, built-in, handles with fabric stick-on straps to secure them to the bag and each other. Each canvas bag is removable and machine-washable for your convenience and makes laundry day a breeze. Hamper holds up to two full-loads of laundry and can fit seamlessly into any bathroom, bedroom or closet.
feature_bullets: HANDWOVEN CRAFTSMANSHIP - Features tightly-woven water hyacinth wicker for an environmentally sustainable and totally unique piece of furniture
DURABLE REMOVABLE BAGS - Includes 2 machine-washable laundry bags in thick, natural white, canvas; bags feature built-in handles with Velcro straps to secure them to the hamper and each other
2-SECTION LAUNDRY SORTER: Divided interior with separate lids make sorting darks from lights a breeze; machine-washable, hamper liner bags can be thrown into the wash with the rest of your linens
EASY TO CARRY - Lift the hamper using the two cut-out handles on either side when you need to do it all at once; or remove the bags to address your dirty clothes load-by-load
Dimensions: 13" D x 22. 75" W x 24" H; 3. 3 bushels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,483 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1-year manufacturer's warranty - seville classics products are backed by a 1-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
